briefdescription.para: A macro that returns the largest of two items.
A macro that returns the smallest of two items.
A macro that rounds a number down to the next multiple.
A macro that rounds a number up to the next multiple.
Declares the touchgfx::colortype, touchgfx::Rect, touchgfx::Vector, touchgfx::Point, touchgfx::Pair classes as well as some less used classes and structs.
